des: "This can be used as a filling for coffeecake, Danish pastries, croissants, or mixed with fruit for pies. It can also be used plain as a tart filling. If you measure by weight, each ingredient is used in equal amounts."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the almond paste, sugar and butter until smooth. Gradually mix in the eggs, and then the flour until well blended. Store in the refrigerator until ready to use.
